EmailTemplate.subject: Unlocking the full potential of virtual care for your clients
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Partner essentials FEATURED Redesigning care delivery that unlocks the full potential of virtual care Consumer expectations of healthcare have changed. In fact, 91% of adults who have used virtual care would do so again in the future instead of an in-person visit.1 Are your clients optimizing their benefits package to meet these expectations? The industry-first Virtual Care Transformation Model from Teladoc Health can help you and your clients identify opportunities for virtual solutions that will help improve access, health outcomes…and the bottom line.
